original_title: Gilberto Gil - Live At Montreux Jazz Festival 2012
overview: Gilberto Gil live at the Montreux Jazz Festival 2012  GILBERTO GIL'S VIRAMUNDO  Feat. Vusi Mahlasela - Paul Hanmer - Jaques Morelenbaum and the Lausanne Sinfonietta  Miles Davis Hall at the Montreux Music & Convention Centre - Montreux, Switzerland
title: Gilberto Gil - Live At Montreux Jazz Festival 2012
